testcase.description:
Test search for multiple product results.
# 1. Setup and preparation
- Start session, open homepage and delete all visible cookies
# 2. Scope of test
- Search for text - Leads to multiple product results - Validate result page (similar to catalog page) - Select a product - Validate product detail page
# 3. Clean up
- End session and clean up created cookies

## Many Results
